org.jgentleframework.core.reflection
Interface Identification<T>

All Known Subinterfaces:
FieldIdentification, MemberIdentification<T>, MethodIdentification, SingleClassIdentification
public interface Identification<T>

Represents an Identification instance.

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com

Field Summary
static int NO_MODIFIERS
           
 
Method Summary
 T[] getMember()
          Returns a member or a set of members.
 void setName(java.lang.String name)
          Sets the name.
 

Field Detail

NO_MODIFIERS

static final int NO_MODIFIERS
Method Detail

setName

void setName(java.lang.String name)
Sets the name. You can use regular expression to specify a set of names.

EX:

setName("str*") will specify all of identification instance have "str" prefix.

Note: As concerns using SingleClassIdentification (an extension of Identification), the regular espression is not supported and the returned data array of getMember() method always has one element.

Parameters:
name - the name to set

getMember

T[] getMember()
Returns a member or a set of members.

Returns:
returns an array containing Field objects if perform success, if not, returns an empty list.
